name: Avoid Functions and Procedures using BIN FIXED(15) instead of  BIN FIXED(31)  for all local variables (PL1)
description: This rule searches all PL1 Procedures and PL1 Functions using BIN FIXED(15) instead of BIN FIXED(31).
output:
This report list all the PL1 Procedures and PL1 Functions using BIN FIXED(15) instead of BIN FIXED(31).

It provides following information: 
-  PL1 Procedure or PL1 Function full name
rationale: Using BIN FIXED(31) provide a better management of the memory.
remediation: Replace the BIN FIXED(15) by BIN FIXED(31).
total: Number of PL1  Procedures and PL1 Functions
